notesShort: Mashing can get stuffed by Wonderwing. Be patient in advantage.
Always take grenade egg away from him if he drops one in front of you. Much better for you to have it than him.
Respect D-Tilt; it's a cheesy move that outranges yours.
Read Tanark's translation of [Rizeasu's Banjo Write-Up](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CtAM6YwpD97-FpVZ_h99ZgVlRy8zwvRKp_-O7yLo3Ug/edit) for more details.

fsmash.notes: Only hits when he's in his animation. If he's hanging all the way down it will miss at every range except roll distance.
